mapper.select: select t.id, t.areaCode, t.deptId, t.category, t.name, t.sex, t.birthday, t.photo, t.placeOfOrigin, t.nation, t.degreee, t.academicTitle, t.rank, t.party, t.joinDate, t.administrativeDuty, t.currentPostDate, t.currentRankDate, t.mobile, t.tel, t.pcode, t.latitude, t.longitude, t.remark, t.intro,a.fullname areaName,b.department_name deptName,c.fullname placeOfOriginName from personage t left join portal.province a on t.areaCode=a.code left join portal.department b on t.deptId=b.department_id left join portal.province c on t.placeOfOrigin=c.code where t.id=#{id}
